Almost 2 months back I lost my right hand middle finger top portion in a tragic incident. Within 15 minutes I went to the nearest orthopaedic hospital, however the doctor & team concluded that they needed to cut the exposed bone of the finger top (amputation) & close it, which means shortening the finger. Luckily God’s grace before taking me to OT, I called my friend Dr. Soumya (Sasya Sanjeevini Panchakarma Center, Gokarna) & explained my situation to her. She contacted Dr. Narayan Hegde Mysore immediately & he gave Dr. N Jithendran Sir’s contact details. Initially the nearest hospital doctor was not ready to discharge me & then Dr. Jithendran Sir convinced him via call, then I went to Dr. Jithendran Sir's clinic. He inspected my finger & gave 2 possible options, i.e., refixing the finger top or reconstruction of the lost finger top depends on the tissues condition of the crushed part. Later he found that the crushed part was unfit for refixing (microscopic observation) and went for reconstruction of the lost finger top using the cross finger flap method. After regular follow up/ checkup, I am glad to say that Dr. Jithendran Sir saved my finger, else it would have been a lifetime regret. Dr. Jithendran Sir is very clear about the methodologies and final outcome. and He is very reachable for any doubts and most importantly he is very kind hearted. I am recovering now and my finger is almost fine, it will take some more time to complete recovery. However I am relieved a lot now compared to the day the tragic incident happened. I am grateful to Dr. Jithendran Sir forever for saving my finger & my friend Dr. Soumya for giving the lead. In words I can not explain my gratitude towards Dr. Jithendran Sir, just beyond the limits.
